snippet: In a recording that appeared online on Sunday, two days after his death, Amedy Coulibaly appeared below the flag of the militant group.
abstract: Video emerges showing Amedy Coulibaly, one of three gunmen killed by police in Paris after terrorist attacks, declaring loyalty to Islamic State group.

byline.original: By RUKMINI CALLIMACHI and ANDREW HIGGINS

lead_paragraph: In a recording that appeared online on Sunday, two days after his death, Amedy Coulibaly appeared below the flag of the militant group.

headline.main: Video Shows a Paris Gunman Declaring His Loyalty to the Islamic State
headline.print_headline: Video Shows a Paris Gunman Declaring His Loyalty to the Islamic State

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
